Package models

Class Blackjack

java.lang.Object
models.Blackjack
public class Blackjack extends Object
Represents a Blackjack game logic class for handling cards, points, and player interaction.

    • getCard

      public org.bson.Document getCard()
      Draws the next card from the collection, updates points, and handles special card logic.
      Returns:
      The drawn card document or null if no more cards are available
